title: Is the air created from water? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. Air is 80% Nitrogen and nearly 20% Oxygen and some trace gases. Water is  which means it contains two Hydrogen atoms and one Oxygen atom. If the Oxygen in the air came from water there would be a lot of Hydrogen in the air (and there isn’t), besides water is stable and doesn’t split into Hydrogen and Oxygen without significant energy input.
